name: 劉如熹
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。

1. 技術創新與管理：有關科技開發案之技術開發管理、人力責任管理及時間任務管理等PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action)之實務探討。
2.本課程將涵蓋以材料化學核心技術(配方與合成、分析與應用)為基礎，發展各種具可應用於光轉換為光、電與熱之新材料，其將分別應用於發光二極體、水分解與生醫熱療之介紹，如下圖所示。 本課程將兼具學術研究與產學研發(實務)。其中並將教授如何製作專利及論文地圖。
1. Technological innovation and management: The management of human resources management and time management of PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) of the practical discussion.
2. This course will cover the development of a variety of new materials that can be applied to light conversion to light, electricity and heat, based on the core chemistry of materials chemistry (formulation and synthesis, analysis and application), which will be applied to light-emitting diodes, water splitting and biomedical, as shown below. This course will combine academic research and practical application which will teach how to make patent and paper maps.
